definition: to touch/to come in contact with/to feel/to be affected by/to catch fire/to burn/(coll.) to fall asleep/(after a verb) hitting the mark/succeeding in
aspect particle indicating action in progress

sentences.english: I heard that when a group of girls tried to escape, they locked them in the rooms and beat them up.
sentences.chinese: 我听说有一群女孩试着逃走，被他们锁在屋子里狠揍。

sentences.english: Well, shouldn't you try to stop them from making this big mistake?
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那你该不该试着阻止他们闯下大祸？

sentences.english: Generally, you should try to make gradations in the notes involved.
sentences.chinese: 通常来说，你应该试着将所用到的音符划分等级。

sentences.english: We experimented with diesel engines to drive the pumps.
sentences.chinese: 我们试着用柴油机来带动水泵。

sentences.english: They tried yelling, even though it was hard to breathe.
sentences.chinese: 他们试着喊救命，尽管连呼吸都十分的困难。

sentences.english: Try to maintain Tadasana even during the transitions between asanas.
sentences.chinese: 即使在体式之间过渡时也试着保持山式。

sentences.english: If you can't turn the key, try putting some oil in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 如果你转不动钥匙，试着往锁里倒点油。

sentences.english: I have tried not to become too conscious of why exactly I came up with it.
sentences.chinese: 我已经试着让自己不要太在意捣鼓出这个书名的原因。

sentences.english: It was imperative to try to tell the story as best as I thought it should be told .
sentences.chinese: 我要试着把这个故事照我认为应该的方式讲得精采。

sentences.english: And, of course, try to eat biodynamic food.
sentences.chinese: 当然还应该试着吃生物动力食品。

sentences.english: I think the man tried to make some kind of connection with Schopenhauer.
sentences.chinese: 我想这个男的试着想要扯上叔本华。

sentences.english: She fusses too much about her health; she's always trying some new medicines.
sentences.chinese: 她对身体太过担心，她总是试着吃新药。

sentences.english: Go talk to them and tell them how you feel.
sentences.chinese: 试着与他们谈谈心，告诉他们你的感受。

sentences.english: Try to do it the others rever done.
sentences.chinese: 试着做他人未做过的事。

sentences.english: We can try to buy some tickets outside the stadium from a scalper.
sentences.chinese: 我们可以试着在体育场外买黄牛票。

definition: there is no harm in/might as well
(used after a verb) give it a go/to do (sth for a bit to give it a try)/one time/once/in a while/all of a sudden/all at once
to strive one's hardest/to spare no effort
